dmca.title: copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: John - JZStudios [mailto:john@jzstudios.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2007 10:50 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed

 

The individual identified below is the "Designated Agent" 

Service Provider(s) 

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries 

 

Name of Agent Designated to Receive Notification of Claimed Infringement
- Andrea Z. Almeida 

 

Full Address of Designated Agent to Which Notification Should be Sent -
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207 

 

Telephone Number of Designated Agent (214) 782-7800 

 

Facsimile Number of Designated Agent - (214) 782-7756 

 

E-Mail Address of Designated Agent copyright@theplanet.com 

 

 

Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed:

 

There are  multiple copyrighted works at a single online site:
actionphotos.biz 

There are hundreds of violations listed under the Turner event. 

 

A representative list of such works at that site follows.

There are many, many more. It would take days to identify them all. 

Anything taken on a black background belongs to me. In addition may of
the balance beam shots are mine as well

 

 

Complaining Party: 

 

John Zawacki

449 Royal Poinciana #112

Punta Gorda, FL 33955

john@jzstudios.com

941-914-4152

 

I was contracted to perform photographic Services at the Turner
Invitational in Bradenton FL.

The individual that contracted me failed to pay for my services as
promised. 

I have contacted the legal department of the  

professional photographers of America on this matter. Because the
photographers  

were never paid all rights to the images belong to the individual
photographers

 

 

The above information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty
of perjury, I am the owner of an have  exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed. 

John M. Zawacki

Capture the moment! Anytime anywhere!
